message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a method for continual learning using neural networks and Bayesian nonparametric framework. The focus is on task-free continual learning, which is relevant to several sub-categories such as machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), and neural networks (cs.NE). However, since the experiments are mainly conducted on image classification and generation tasks, cs.CV and cs.LG are the most likely sub-categories, followed by cs.AI, cs.CL, and cs.NE.
